column4: Anyone here had any luck installing GRUB on disks that are 2tb or larger?
The auto-installer keeps formatting the disk as GPT which.. stops GRUB from working

I've never tried that, but I assume you would run into similar problems as with the old 1024-sector limit, with a similar workaround: Create a boot partition near the beginning of the disk and everything should work.
Wont help, Im setting up a server so i has to be in a RAID array
